Womens Shoes - Trendy Online Shopping For 2011

As always, womens shoes are one of the biggest sellers of all fashion retail products. So, what footwear styles are creating fashion trends in 2011? Below is a look at the women's trending shoe styles that are hot and selling fast this year in stores and through online shopping.

Snakeskin and Fake Skin

Fake snakeskin-textured shoes are very hot this year. No, the footwear is not made from real snakeskin. Rather, they are embossed with a texture that imitates this favored reptile. &lt;a href=&quot;http://www.topchristianlouboutinshoesmall.com&quot;&gt;Christian Louboutin Sale&lt;/a&gt; Other fake animal skins are &lt;a href=&quot;http://www.topchristianlouboutinshoesmall.com&quot;&gt;Christian Louboutin Shoes&lt;/a&gt; popular this year in womens shoes including zebra, leopard, cheetah, ostrich, and tiger. Also trending is footwear for vegetarians and vegans, as well as for those who wish to wear only synthetic materials on their feet.

Fancy Flats

Flats and sandals are also popular fashion trends in 2011. Flats are sometimes called skimmers, sandals, or ballet slippers and are often decorated with costume jewelry and fancy straps to dress up these fashion staples. Even the lowly flip-flop or thong sandal is making a huge and splashy comeback as standard summer footwear, though it too is dressier and more ornate.
